name: KuH 25 T-Shirt
longDescription: Show your support for the KuH 25 Festival with this official T-Shirt. Made from high-quality cotton, this comfortable shirt features the festival logo and design. Perfect for any music lover or festival enthusiast.

name: KuH 25 Festival Poster
longDescription: Decorate your walls with this stunning limited edition KuH 25 Festival poster. Featuring the official festival artwork, this high-quality print is perfect for any music lover's collection. Each poster is printed on premium paper to ensure vibrant colors and long-lasting quality.

name: KuH 25 Lighter
longDescription: Keep the festival spirit alive with this KuH 25 branded lighter. Compact, reliable, and featuring the festival logo, this lighter is a practical and stylish accessory for any festival-goer. Perfect for lighting candles, campfires, or just as a collectible item.
